ENGLISH: Acid Turret is a deployable combat system equipped with rapid firing Corrosive Gun.
Crystal Mortar is a deployable version of Crystal Sentry used by Crystal Ejector Tower.
A field-deployable version of Morphium Tower. The compact Morphium Spike do not have any shielding capabilities.
A converted Sentry Gun consumable equipped with compact short range magma caster.
A special Sentry Gun armed with a gravity wave weapon that is very powerful against big creatures.
Field-deployable, self-contained autonomous automatic grenade launcher armed with high explosive grenades.
Radio Shotgun Turret is a combat turret armed with scatter-shot radiation emitter.
A miniaturized, self-contained Shockwave Tower that can inflict cryo damage to enemies in a wide area.
